thread.section_title: Choice Home Warranty Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Choice Home Warranty | www.choicehomewarranty.com
thread.title: Buffie Shields
thread.title_full: Choice Home Warranty reviewed by Buffie Shields

author: Buffie Shields
title: Buffie Shields
text: I had made an appointment with one of the contractors choice had hired to fix my garbage disposable and due to uncontrollable situation the contractor could not make it that day,due to the fact his work truck had broke down.I immediately call choice and explained what had occurred. Less than 30 minutes they had assigned a different company to come out and they were able to do it that same day. Now that's what I call great customer service and a quick response.I would recommend Choice to anyone looking for a reliable and trustworthy home warranty.
